| A spined devil:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* has a [thick hide](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned").
* is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") to eat.
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is a [demon](/wiki/M2_DEMON "M2 DEMON").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* normally appears in large [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* requires a +1 weapon to hit.
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame. |                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4031](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4031 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The **spined devil** is a [major demon](/wiki/Major_demon "Major demon") added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It is fast, but relatively weak.

## Strategy

Few players will find these a threat: they are relatively fast, but do incredibly poor damage for a monster that only appears in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"), with their two attacks only doing 10 points of physical base damage at most.

Early [doppelgangers](/wiki/Doppelganger_\(starting_race\) "Doppelganger (starting race)") may find this a useful polymorph form, however; they can start turning into spined devils with 60% success rate at experience level 3. While lacking any special sort of attacks, the form is fast and [inediate](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"), more than sufficient for use in the early game.

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")
html:
Spined devil

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
& spined devil
Difficulty 11
Attacks Weapon 1d6, Claw 1d4
& spined devil
Difficulty 11
Attacks

Weapon 1d6, Claw 1d4

Base level 5
Base experience 105
Speed 18
Base AC 1
Base MR 45
Alignment 7 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances death magic, fire, poison, level drain
Resistances conveyed None

A spined devil:

  • can fly.
  • has a thick hide.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is a demon.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • normally appears in large groups.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • requires a +1 weapon to hit.
  • may turn against you when tame.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4031

The spined devil is a major demon added in SLASH'EM. It is fast, but relatively weak.

Strategy

Few players will find these a threat: they are relatively fast, but do incredibly poor damage for a monster that only appears in Gehennom, with their two attacks only doing 10 points of physical base damage at most.

Early doppelgangers may find this a useful polymorph form, however; they can start turning into spined devils with 60% success rate at experience level 3. While lacking any special sort of attacks, the form is fast and inediate, more than sufficient for use in the early game.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Spined_devil&oldid=162156"
